inclusion.criterion: Café-au-lait spots with coast of Maine borders and respect for the midline
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any MAS patient or control who has not or cannot discontinue any home regimens of antihistamines or glucocorticoids (including inhaled steroids) at least seven days prior to skin testing.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Any MAS patient or control on tricyclic antidepressants within two weeks prior to skin testing.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
